name: 水滴灵
description: 由纯净的泉水凝聚而成的小精灵，身体透明如水晶，总是发出叮咚的水滴声。

features: 内部有微微发光的蓝色核心
头顶有一滴永不落下的水珠

ecology.habitat: 清澈的山间溪流和泉眼

image_prompts.design: A small water droplet spirit with a transparent crystalline body. A glowing blue core visible inside, a water drop crown on its head. Low poly style with faceted geometric surfaces, sharp edges on crystal forms, ink sketch texture on water ripples, non-reflective surface with matte blue and cyan tones, gentle and pure appearance.
